scenes.description: Gura sings 'Happy Birthday' to herself and talks about her age.
Gura interacts with the chat, discussing if the stream is pre-recorded and asking viewers not to be mean on her birthday.
Gura thanks the audience for coming and for the birthday wishes on social media.
Gura mentions a chat with staff about how emotional she gets on her birthday and discusses a gift from the fans.
Gura talks about her strawberry birthday cake and comments on the chat emojis.
Gura talks about overthinking things on her birthday, leading to thoughts about planets and UFOs.
Gura prepares to look at a group birthday gift and promises not to cry.

subtitles.original: What was it?
subtitles.english: What was it?

subtitles.original: Happy birthday to me.
subtitles.english: Happy birthday to me.

subtitles.original: I look like a baby...
subtitles.english: I look like a baby...

subtitles.original: ...um, but I...
subtitles.english: ...um, but I...

subtitles.original: ...I can't rhyme with "E".
subtitles.english: ...I can't rhyme with "E".

subtitles.original: Dooba-dooba-doom. Ah.
subtitles.english: Dooba-dooba-doom. Ah.

subtitles.original: Okay, just making sure. Is this pre-recorded? No.
subtitles.english: Okay, just making sure. Is this pre-recorded? No.

subtitles.original: Sucks to suck.
subtitles.english: Sucks to suck.

subtitles.original: I'm sorry, I can't say that.
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, I can't say that.

subtitles.original: I can't be... I can't be...
subtitles.english: I can't be... I can't be...

subtitles.original: ...I can't be like that already. I'm sorry if I'm a bit on the...
subtitles.english: ...I can't be like that already. I'm sorry if I'm a bit on the...

subtitles.original: ...um, I'm gonna bite you.
subtitles.english: ...um, I'm gonna bite you.

subtitles.original: Don't say anything mean to me. It's my birthday.
subtitles.english: Don't say anything mean to me. It's my birthday.

subtitles.original: Do you see this face? When you're bullying me...
subtitles.english: Do you see this face? When you're bullying me...

subtitles.original: ...this is the face you're bullying. Do you see this?
subtitles.english: ...this is the face you're bullying. Do you see this?

subtitles.original: How could you? How could you?
subtitles.english: How could you? How could you?

subtitles.original: This is what you're being mean to.
subtitles.english: This is what you're being mean to.

subtitles.original: I can't bully the birthday girl. It's not fair.
subtitles.english: I can't bully the birthday girl. It's not fair.

subtitles.original: Or is it that you can only bully someone on their birthday?
subtitles.english: Or is it that you can only bully someone on their birthday?

subtitles.original: Or... Well, technically bullying, I guess, is... it hits a bit harder when it's your birthday.
subtitles.english: Or... Well, technically bullying, I guess, is... it hits a bit harder when it's your birthday.

subtitles.original: Oh my goodness, do we have stuff to do!
subtitles.english: Oh my goodness, do we have stuff to do!

subtitles.original: Do I have this... not the brain for it.
subtitles.english: Do I have this... not the brain for it.

subtitles.original: So much to do, so little brain space. So little brain activity.
subtitles.english: So much to do, so little brain space. So little brain activity.

subtitles.original: I can't hear over the jazz band, but you guys seem to be okay with it.
subtitles.english: I can't hear over the jazz band, but you guys seem to be okay with it.

subtitles.original: I just want to say thank you guys for coming.
subtitles.english: I just want to say thank you guys for coming.

subtitles.original: Thank you for being here. Thank you for all of my birthday wishes that I saw on Twitter.
subtitles.english: Thank you for being here. Thank you for all of my birthday wishes that I saw on Twitter.

subtitles.original: And all of you here saying "Happy Birthday". Thank you so much.
subtitles.english: And all of you here saying "Happy Birthday". Thank you so much.

subtitles.original: Alright, chill out, jazz.
subtitles.english: Alright, chill out, jazz.

subtitles.original: Thank you guys. I really do appreciate it.
subtitles.english: Thank you guys. I really do appreciate it.

subtitles.original: It makes me feel very warm and fuzzy.
subtitles.english: It makes me feel very warm and fuzzy.

subtitles.original: I was having a chat with...
subtitles.english: I was having a chat with...

subtitles.original: ...uh, Staff-san, Ma-Man-san, management...
subtitles.english: ...uh, Staff-san, Ma-Man-san, management...

subtitles.original: ...and I was talking about how... how easy it is for me to cry, especially on my birthday.
subtitles.english: ...and I was talking about how... how easy it is for me to cry, especially on my birthday.

subtitles.original: I was like, "Oh boy". Because they came to me and they were like, "Girl, you know..."
subtitles.english: I was like, "Oh boy". Because they came to me and they were like, "Girl, you know..."

subtitles.original: ...we got a... we got a gift for you from quite a few EBIs."
subtitles.english: ...we got a... we got a gift for you from quite a few EBIs."

subtitles.original: And I said, "Oh no. Is this..."
subtitles.english: And I said, "Oh no. Is this..."

subtitles.original: ...is this going to be my... my big cry?"
subtitles.english: ...is this going to be my... my big cry?"

subtitles.original: "My big unconsol- unconsolable... my big unconsolable cry session on stream?"
subtitles.english: "My big unconsol- unconsolable... my big unconsolable cry session on stream?"

subtitles.original: It's like almost every year I have at least one.
subtitles.english: It's like almost every year I have at least one.

subtitles.original: At least one big cry-fest because I'm a big baby.
subtitles.english: At least one big cry-fest because I'm a big baby.

subtitles.original: I'm a big cry baby. And that's okay. That's A-OK.
subtitles.english: I'm a big cry baby. And that's okay. That's A-OK.

subtitles.original: Oh my god, I forgot to tell you about my birthday cake!
subtitles.english: Oh my god, I forgot to tell you about my birthday cake!

subtitles.original: So, my birthday cake... can you guess what kind of cake it is? Hmm?
subtitles.english: So, my birthday cake... can you guess what kind of cake it is? Hmm?

subtitles.original: I got a... don't guess, I'm gonna tell you.
subtitles.english: I got a... don't guess, I'm gonna tell you.

subtitles.original: I got a strawberry cake. It's got like whipped cream and strawberries.
subtitles.english: I got a strawberry cake. It's got like whipped cream and strawberries.

subtitles.original: Did you guess? Yeah, strawberries.
subtitles.english: Did you guess? Yeah, strawberries.

subtitles.original: My favorite. My favorite. I could eat my weight in strawberries in like two hours.
subtitles.english: My favorite. My favorite. I could eat my weight in strawberries in like two hours.

subtitles.original: Give me two hours and I'll eat an entire thing of strawberries.
subtitles.english: Give me two hours and I'll eat an entire thing of strawberries.

subtitles.original: Yeah. Also, do you see your little... do you see this? The little emojis on the side?
subtitles.english: Yeah. Also, do you see your little... do you see this? The little emojis on the side?

subtitles.original: I can see all your emojis. So if all you guys put in the poopoo emoji...
subtitles.english: I can see all your emojis. So if all you guys put in the poopoo emoji...

subtitles.original: ...it would just be a stream of poopoo.
subtitles.english: ...it would just be a stream of poopoo.

subtitles.original: But I'm seeing a lot of... what do I see? Hearts, hundred... likes stuff.
subtitles.english: But I'm seeing a lot of... what do I see? Hearts, hundred... likes stuff.

subtitles.original: I don't think the custom emojis go through though.
subtitles.english: I don't think the custom emojis go through though.

subtitles.original: But yeah, hello! Thank you! Thank you for the hellos and the happy birthdays.
subtitles.english: But yeah, hello! Thank you! Thank you for the hellos and the happy birthdays.

subtitles.original: Happy birthday, happy birthday.
subtitles.english: Happy birthday, happy birthday.

subtitles.original: Ah, one year older. Isn't that weird to think about?
subtitles.english: Ah, one year older. Isn't that weird to think about?

subtitles.original: See, the problem around my birthday is I start to do a little too much deep think... and next thing you know I'm spiraling.
subtitles.english: See, the problem around my birthday is I start to do a little too much deep think... and next thing you know I'm spiraling.

subtitles.original: Like, "Oh! I'm birthday!" And then you think about the planet, and then the spinning of the planet...
subtitles.english: Like, "Oh! I'm birthday!" And then you think about the planet, and then the spinning of the planet...

subtitles.original: ...and then all of the planets... and then I start thinking about UFOs.
subtitles.english: ...and then all of the planets... and then I start thinking about UFOs.

subtitles.original: And then I freaked myself out really bad and I had to go to bed.
subtitles.english: And then I freaked myself out really bad and I had to go to bed.

subtitles.original: You ever do that? Don't let the brain run too fast.
subtitles.english: You ever do that? Don't let the brain run too fast.

subtitles.original: Because sometimes it runs down really scary places. UFO!
subtitles.english: Because sometimes it runs down really scary places. UFO!

subtitles.original: Oh boy, what do we have planned for today?
subtitles.english: Oh boy, what do we have planned for today?

subtitles.original: I guess we could... we could take a peek at the birthday gift that a big group of you worked on for me.
subtitles.english: I guess we could... we could take a peek at the birthday gift that a big group of you worked on for me.

subtitles.original: I won't cry, I promise I won't cry. Pinky promise.
subtitles.english: I won't cry, I promise I won't cry. Pinky promise.

subtitles.original: And then afterwards, I have some gifts for you.
subtitles.english: And then afterwards, I have some gifts for you.
